title: How Rick Perry Became a Figure in the Impeachment Inquiry
text:
Long before Ukraine was central to an impeachment inquiry into President Trump, it was central to Rick Perry’s plan for Europe.

Early after he took the job in 2017, the energy secretary said he saw a continent uncomfortably reliant on Russian energy, with potential to be a U.S. customer instead. Ukraine, at the crossroads of East and West, Mr. Perry thought, was key: Sell more U.S. natural gas there, as the U.S. itself was becoming an energy exporter, and it can both reach other European countries and cut down on Russia’s...
description: Long before Ukraine was central to the Trump impeachment probe, it was key to Energy Secretary Rick Perry’s plan for Europe.
